# Drugi zadatak

```{r}
basement_area = dataset$TotalBsmtSF
neighbourhood = dataset$Neighborhood
```

```{r}
basement_sizes = findInterval(basement_area, c(0, 1, 500, 1000, 1500, 2000))
freq_tbl = table(basement_sizes, neighbourhood)
```
```{r}
tbl = addmargins(freq_tbl)

for (col_names in colnames(tbl)){
  for (row_names in rownames(tbl)){
    if (!(row_names == 'Sum' | col_names == 'Sum') ){
      cat('Oƒçekivane frekvencije za razred ',col_names,'-',row_names,': ',(tbl[row_names,'Sum'] * tbl['Sum',col_names]) / tbl['Sum','Sum'],'\n')
    }
  }
}
```

```{r}
fisher.test(tbl, simulate.p.value=T)
```
# P-value je malen, < 0.05, odbacujemo H0
